Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end

-- Copied from Grimgold Periastron Beta
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local equipped = false
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function cut(hit) local humanoid local vPlayer if hit and hit.Parent and myHumanoid then if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(27) end end end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
Sword.Touched:connect(cut)

-- Copied from Grimgold Periastron Beta
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local anims = {Tool:WaitForChild("RightSlash"), Tool:WaitForChild("Slash"), Tool:WaitForChild("SlashAnim"), Tool:WaitForChild("SlashAnim"), Tool:WaitForChild("SlashAnim")} local slashAnim local holdAnim
local LightsOutSound
local swing
local lastAttack = 0
local DARKNESS_LOCK_TIME = 30 local TRANSPARENT_TIME = 15 local DARKNESS_SPARKLES_TIME = 1
local r = game:service("RunService")
function lunge(humanoid, torso) local holdAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.RightSlash) if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() else Tool.Enabled = true return end local target = humanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) newBV = nil if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = torso torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(torso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, torso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(.75) if newBV ~= nil then newBV:remove() end wait(.5)
end
function lightsOut(key) if key:lower() == "q" and not Tool:FindFirstChild('DarknessDisabled') and not game.Lighting:FindFirstChild("BlackPeriastronWasHere") and vCharacter then LightsOutSound = Tool:FindFirstChild('LightsOutSound') if LightsOutSound then LightsOutSound:Play() end -- Create tag in lighting so other players with this gear can't mess it up LightingTag = Instance.new("BoolValue") LightingTag.Name = "BlackPeriastronWasHere" LightingTag.Value = true LightingTag.Parent = game.Lighting
-- Remove sparkles, make handle invisible... local sparkles = Handle:FindFirstChild('Sparkles') if sparkles then sparkles.Parent = nil end
-- Lock special attack so you can't use it multiple times in succession. local lock = Instance.new('BoolValue') lock.Name = 'DarknessDisabled' lock.Value = true lock.Parent = Tool game:GetService('Debris'):AddItem(lock, DARKNESS_LOCK_TIME)
-- Make sparkles reset when darkness can be used again Tool.ChildRemoved:connect(function(child) if child.Name == 'DarknessDisabled' then if sparkles then sparkles.Parent = Handle end end end)
-- Create a new part to hold the light local lightHolder = Instance.new('Part') lightHolder.CanCollide = false lightHolder.Anchored = true lightHolder.Transparency = 1.0 lightHolder.Position = Handle.Position lightHolder.Name = 'BlackPeriastronLightHolder' lightHolder.Parent = Workspace
-- Script to absorb light is in workspace so it can be reset even if -- this character dies local lightsOutScript = Tool:WaitForChild('LightsOutScript'):Clone() lightsOutScript.LightHolder.Value = lightHolder lightsOutScript.Handle.Value = Handle lightsOutScript.Parent = Workspace lightsOutScript.Disabled = false
-- But script to make character invisble just goes under the character. local ninjafyScript = Tool:WaitForChild('Ninjafy'):Clone() ninjafyScript.Parent = vCharacter ninjafyScript.Disabled = false end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
-- Add sparkles for visibility if it's dark if Handle.Transparency > 0.5 then local newSparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles") newSparkles.SparkleColor = Color3.new(0,0,0) newSparkles.Parent = Handle game:GetService('Debris'):AddItem(newSparkles, DARKNESS_SPARKLES_TIME) end
Tool.Enabled = false tick() local num = anims[math.random(1, #anims)] print(num) local t = r.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastAttack < 0.2) then lunge(myHumanoid, myTorso) else slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(num) if slashAnim then slashAnim:Play() end end lastAttack = t
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(lightsOut) end vCharacter = Tool.Parent end
function onUnequipped() if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() end if LightsOutSound then LightsOutSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Lighting = game.Lighting local Ambient = Lighting.Ambient local OutdoorAmbient = Lighting.OutdoorAmbient local TimeOfDay = Lighting.TimeOfDay local LightHolder = script:WaitForChild('LightHolder').Value local Handle = script:WaitForChild('Handle').Value
local BLACK = Color3.new(0,0,0) local MIDNIGHT = "00:00:00" local LIGHT_BRIGHTNESS = 5 local LIGHT_RANGE = 45 local TIME_OF_DARKNESS = 15
local function AbsorbLight() Lighting.Ambient = BLACK Lighting.OutdoorAmbient = BLACK Lighting.TimeOfDay = MIDNIGHT
local light = Instance.new("PointLight") light.Brightness = LIGHT_BRIGHTNESS light.Range = LIGHT_RANGE light.Parent = LightHolder
Handle.Transparency = 1.0 end
local function ReturnToNormal() Lighting.Ambient = Ambient Lighting.OutdoorAmbient = OutdoorAmbient Lighting.TimeOfDay = TimeOfDay
local tag = Lighting:FindFirstChild("BlackPeriastronWasHere") if tag then tag:Remove() end
LightHolder:Destroy()
Handle.Transparency = 0.0 end
AbsorbLight() wait(TIME_OF_DARKNESS) ReturnToNormal() script:Remove()
